Properties

AngleSectorRad

How wide the circle sector is.

public float AngleSectorRad { get; set; }

Property Value

float

ArcPoints

How many points are used for the circle sector arc. 0 creates a triangle where the arc is a straight line.

public int ArcPoints { get; set; }

int
